metadata.Title: CVE-2014-8761 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
inc/template.php in DokuWiki before 2014-05-05a only checks for access to the root namespace, which allows remote attackers to access arbitrary images via a media file details ajax call.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-8761` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

dokuwiki - 0.0.20140505.a+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dokuwiki package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.0.20140505.a+dfsg-1').
